data.name: Rat Chef
data.detailed_description:
Discover how hard it is to cook when you are a rat and everything is 100X bigger than yourself.

You play as a rat who has to cook for your customers.
Customers come in at different times and ask you for some food. If you do not have time to give them before they get angry, they will go again, and you get no money or XP. buy the ingredients at a store next to your restaurant. You have to put the ingredients in some machines e.g the bread ingredient you will have to put in the bread machine, and it could not be easier because the store you buy it from has collected the ingredients in a bottle you can buy.

Once you have the ingredients and have put them in the machine, you will be able to see next to the machine how many e.g bread you can make before you have to pick up some new ingredients.

If some things burn, turn on the sprinklers in the area where the fire is, but be careful not to hit your customers with the water, because if they get wet, they get angry and go without paying.

While cooking, you have to make money that you have to pay for the food for your restaurant and bills. You can unlock skins to your rat so you can look cool. You get XP when you play. If you do not want to start your restaurant alone, you can invite your friends to play with you and have fun.

data.short_description: This game is about you playing like a rat. You own a restaurant, and you have to deliver food to your customers and they will come very fast so hurry up!! At the same time as you keep your restaurant up, you should still make a profit on it so you can pay for the food and bills

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 139 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7400
  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 139 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
